title: ECS READING ASSIGNMENT 2
content: Hi everyone, my name is Claudia and I live in Venice, the city of canals. The city is also known as 'The floating City' and is one of themost picturesque cities of the world.Because of its winding canals, striking architecture and beautiful bridges Venice is a popular destination for travel.My father got fortunate enough to get an apartment for our familyhere. My father works in the tourism department and gets to have amazing projects which let him travel around the world. My motherand younger brother stay at home and I do an internship with arestaurant which serves delectable delicacies. Tourists from all overthe world visit the restaurant and make it an exciting place.Usually, the evenings are well-lit and blissful. Sometimes, it feels thata part of the whole world resides in our restaurant.
